name: feed the blob
description:
this game is about feeding the blobs below the feder by dragging the mouse on the window while holding the left button that is all

Recommended way to run the game is trough the GitHub source code because the source code is always up to the newest version which has the best quality and is the definitive way to play the game

the source code: feed-the-blob/assets at main · XFajk/feed-the-blob (github.com)
